markdown.markdown:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

mofo <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "mofo")

```

```{r}
mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(treat, yld))+
  geom_col()+
  facet_wrap(~study)
```

## Histogram

```{r}
h <- mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(scl))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10)
  

```

```{r}
b <- mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(scl))+
  geom_boxplot()
  

```

```{r}

library(patchwork)
h / b
```

```{r}
mofo2 <- mofo 
 
```

```{r}
h2 <- mofo2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(yld))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10)
h2

h / h2
```

```{r}
survey <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "survey")

survey |> 
  filter(state == "RS") |> 
  count(species, residue) |> 
  arrange(n) |> 
  rename(res = residue) |> 
  mutate(n_class = case_when(
          n < 30 ~ "baixa",
          TRUE ~ "Alta"))
```
